column4: anyone know why my nvidia x server shows my current monitor as a CRT-0? and my second as Acer AL1916W (disabled)?
you need to enable it if you want the second monitor
I did enable it. but when I hit quit and start it back up it goes back to disabled.
try it with sudo nvidia-settings then enable the second monitor then save the configuration to xorg there are buttons for it in the nvidia-settings
